title: Talking About Experience
description: Learn how to talk about past experiences with simple B1-entry structures.

steps.teacher: 我以前做過類似的工作。
expected_answer: 我以前做過類似的工作。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yǐ qián zuò guò lèi sì de gōng zuò.
steps.english_hint: I have done similar work before.

steps.teacher: 我曾經參加過一個短期的培訓。
expected_answer: 我曾經參加過一個短期的培訓。
steps.pinyin: wǒ céng jīng cān jiā guò yí gè duǎn qī de péi xùn.
steps.english_hint: I once joined a short training program.

steps.teacher: 那次經驗讓我學到很多東西。
expected_answer: 那次經驗讓我學到很多東西。
steps.pinyin: nà cì jīng yàn ràng wǒ xué dào hěn duō dōng xī.
steps.english_hint: That experience taught me a lot.

steps.teacher: 我曾經在國外生活過半年。
expected_answer: 我曾經在國外生活過半年。
steps.pinyin: wǒ céng jīng zài guó wài shēng huó guò bàn nián.
steps.english_hint: I once lived abroad for half a year.

steps.teacher: 那段時間讓我變得更獨立。
expected_answer: 那段時間讓我變得更獨立。
steps.pinyin: nà duàn shí jiān ràng wǒ biàn dé gèng dú lì.
steps.english_hint: That period made me more independent.

steps.teacher: 我以前學過一點相關的技能。
expected_answer: 我以前學過一點相關的技能。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yǐ qián xué guò yì diǎn xiāng guān de jì néng.
steps.english_hint: I learned some related skills before.

steps.teacher: 我做過志工，所以習慣跟人溝通。
expected_answer: 我做過志工，所以習慣跟人溝通。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zuò guò zhì gōng, suǒ yǐ xí guàn gēn rén gōu tōng.
steps.english_hint: I have done volunteer work, so I'm used to talking with people.

steps.teacher: 我以前遇過類似的問題。
expected_answer: 我以前遇過類似的問題。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yǐ qián yù guò lèi sì de wèn tí.
steps.english_hint: I have encountered similar problems before.

steps.teacher: 那次失敗讓我學會更仔細一點。
expected_answer: 那次失敗讓我學會更仔細一點。
steps.pinyin: nà cì shī bài ràng wǒ xué huì gèng zǐ xì yì diǎn.
steps.english_hint: That failure taught me to be more careful.

steps.teacher: 總的來說，我的經驗都很有幫助。
expected_answer: 總的來說，我的經驗都很有幫助。
steps.pinyin: zǒng de lái shuō, wǒ de jīng yàn dōu hěn yǒu bāng zhù.
steps.english_hint: Overall, my experiences have been very helpful.

review.summary: You learned B1-entry ways to talk about past experience.
